name: QA - Aliclad
Pre-start
Cavity system signed off by MAIN CONTRACTOR and is suitable for install
Check structure layout provides adequate fixing points to be able to meet the requirements of the PS1/drawings
Check joinery and abutments for alignment
Check building wrap/RAB/insulation/siderise for defects & Window head flashings for vaproshield
Seal stopend of window head flashing to the jamb flashing (aliclad windows only). Seal window sill flashing stopends
Check presence and correct fitment of any other preliminary/critical elements, such as penetrations
Aliclad Cladding Installation
Vermin and interstory flashings installed (if required)
Naideck tape applied to gib/wrap at all fixing locations
Panels are correct colour and size for location
Panels scratch and defect free, any cut edges deburred
Aliclad finishing trims/caps installed
Aliclad cleaned
QA - Window Flashings
Pre-start
Window installed, rylock head-flashing installed with end dams
Brick Shelf angle installed (brick windows only)
Check building wrap/RAB for defects
Pre-cladding installation
Support angles installed - 100x50 for brick, 50x50 for Aliclad areas
Flashings installed as per design
Flashings sealed and cleaned
